description: Use this operation to describe a FeatureGroup. The response includes information on the creation time, FeatureGroup name, the unique identifier for each FeatureGroup, and more.

parameters.name: FeatureGroupName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup you want described.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupName
nested_items.description: he name of the FeatureGroup.

nested_items.name: RecordIdentifierFeatureName
nested_items.description: The name of the Feature used for RecordIdentifier, whose value uniquely identifies a record stored in the feature store.

nested_items.name: EventTimeFeatureName
nested_items.description: The name of the feature that stores the EventTime of a Record in a FeatureGroup.

nested_items.name: FeatureDefinitions
nested_items.description: A list of the Features in the FeatureGroup. Each feature is defined by a FeatureName and FeatureType.

nested_items.name: FeatureName
nested_items.description: The name of a feature. The type must be a string. FeatureName cannot be any of the following: is_deleted, write_time, api_invocation_time.
Must start with an alphanumeric character.
Can only include alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens. Spaces are not allowed.

nested_items.name: FeatureType
nested_items.description: The value type of a feature. Valid values are Integral, Fractional, or String.

nested_items.name: CollectionType
nested_items.description: A grouping of elements where each element within the collection must have the same feature type ( String, Integral, or Fractional).
List: An ordered collection of elements.
Set: An unordered collection of unique elements.
Vector: A specialized list that represents a fixed-size array of elements. The vector dimension is determined by you. Must have elements with fractional feature types.

nested_items.name: CollectionConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration for your collection.

nested_items.name: VectorConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration for your vector collection type.
Dimension: The number of elements in your vector.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating when SageMaker created the FeatureGroup.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating when the feature group was last updated.

nested_items.name: OnlineStoreConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for the OnlineStore.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfig
nested_items.description: Use to specify KMS Key ID ( KMSKeyId) for at-rest encryption of your OnlineStore.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key ARN that SageMaker Feature Store uses to encrypt the Amazon S3 objects at rest using Amazon S3 server-side encryption.
"kms:Encrypt"
"kms:Decrypt"
"kms:DescribeKey"
"kms:CreateGrant"
"kms:RetireGrant"
"kms:ReEncryptFrom"
"kms:ReEncryptTo"
"kms:GenerateDataKey"
"kms:ListAliases"
"kms:ListGrants"
"kms:RevokeGrant"

nested_items.name: EnableOnlineStore
nested_items.description: Turn OnlineStore off by specifying False for the EnableOnlineStore flag. Turn OnlineStore on by specifying True for the EnableOnlineStore flag.

nested_items.name: TtlDuration
nested_items.description: Time to live duration, where the record is hard deleted after the expiration time is reached; ExpiresAt = EventTime + TtlDuration. For information on HardDelete, see the DeleteRecord API in the Amazon SageMaker API Reference guide.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: TtlDuration time unit.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: TtlDuration time value.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Option for different tiers of low latency storage for real-time data retrieval.
Standard: A managed low latency data store for feature groups.
InMemory: A managed data store for feature groups that supports very low latency retrieval.

nested_items.name: OfflineStoreConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of the offline store. It includes the following configurations:
Amazon S3 location of the offline store.
Configuration of the Glue data catalog.
Table format of the offline store.
Option to disable the automatic creation of a Glue table for the offline store.
Encryption configuration.

nested_items.name: ThroughputConfig
nested_items.description: Active throughput configuration of the feature group. There are two modes: ON_DEMAND and PROVISIONED. With on-demand mode, you are charged for data reads and writes that your application performs on your feature group. You do not need to specify read and write throughput because Feature Store accommodates your workloads as they ramp up and down. You can switch a feature group to on-demand only once in a 24 hour period. With provisioned throughput mode, you specify the read and write capacity per second that you expect your application to require, and you are billed based on those limits. Exceeding provisioned throughput will result in your requests being throttled.

nested_items.name: ThroughputMode
nested_items.description: The mode used for your feature group throughput: ON_DEMAND or PROVISIONED.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedReadCapacityUnits
nested_items.description: For provisioned feature groups with online store enabled, this indicates the read throughput you are billed for and can consume without throttling.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedWriteCapacityUnits
nested_items.description: For provisioned feature groups, this indicates the write throughput you are billed for and can consume without throttling.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM execution role used to persist data into the OfflineStore if an OfflineStoreConfig is provided.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the feature group.

nested_items.name: OfflineStoreStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the OfflineStore. Notifies you if replicating data into the OfflineStore has failed. Returns either: Active or Blocked.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: An OfflineStore status.

nested_items.name: BlockedReason
nested_items.description: The justification for why the OfflineStoreStatus is Blocked (if applicable).

nested_items.name: LastUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: A value indicating whether the update made to the feature group was successful.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A value that indicates whether the update was made successful.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If the update wasn't successful, indicates the reason why it failed.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the FeatureGroup failed to be replicated in the OfflineStore. This is failure can occur because:
The FeatureGroup could not be created in the OfflineStore.
The FeatureGroup could not be deleted from the OfflineStore.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A free form description of the feature group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to resume pagination of the list of Features ( FeatureDefinitions).

nested_items.name: OnlineStoreTotalSizeBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the OnlineStore in bytes.
